name: Celina Miraglia Herrera de Figueiredo
content: Celina Herrera de Figueiredo: Home Page Celina Miraglia Herrera de Figueiredo Professor of Computer Science at PESC, COPPE, UFRJ Supported by a CNPq research fellowship and by a FAPERJ research grant Member of the program committee of LATIN 2026 Member of the program committee of FCT 2025 Member of the program committee of WG 2025 Member of the steering committee of LAGOS Member of the steering committee of LAWCG Member of the Technical Scientific Board of IMPA Member of the Advisory Committee CA-CC of CNPq Member of the Jury of the L'Oréal–Unesco–ABC Program for Women in Science Member of the editorial board of RAIRO Theoretical Informatics and Applications Member of the editorial board of Bulletin of the Brazilian Mathematical Society Member of the editorial board of Matemática Contemporânea Member of the editorial board of SBMAC SpringerBriefs Member of the editorial committee of IMPA bio · research · publications · events · online Engenharia de Sistemas e Computação, COPPE, Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro Caixa Postal 68511, 21941-972 Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil www.cos.ufrj.br/~celina • celina@cos.ufrj.br • +55 21 3938-8673 Last update: Mon Aug 11 11:49:28 -03 2025 by celina
